mapper.select: select Email, First_Name, Last_Name, Pass, exists(select * from admins where admins.Email = accounts.Email) as admin from accounts;
select CcNumber from Customer where Ccnumber = #{cc_number};

select Email, First_Name, Last_Name, exists(select * from admins where admins.Email = #{email}) as is_admin, exists(select * from clients where clients.Email = #{email}) as is_client, exists(select * from customer where customer.Email = #{email}) as is_customer, exists(select * from owners where owners.Email = #{email}) as is_owner from accounts where Email = #{email} and Pass = #{passwd};
select Accounts.Email, Phone_number from Accounts left join Clients on Accounts.Email = Clients.Email where Accounts.Email = #{email} or Phone_number = #{phone_number};
mapper.insert: insert into accounts (Email, First_name, Last_name, pass) values (#{email}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{password});
insert into Customer (Email, CcNumber, Cvv, Exp_Date, Location) values (#{customer_email}, #{cc_number}, #{cvv}, #{exp_date}, #{location});
